What the fuck is going on here? How can this country condemn/punish homosexuals, yet lock their wives and children away, and engage solely in this type of activity. Male only.It's quite… [+91 chars]

articles.description: Российский боец Хабиб Нурмагомедов ответил на критику со стороны Конора Макгрегора.
articles.content: Hug legs? Have you forgot how I knock you down, or you typing tweets drunk? Beat you in striking, parts you up in wrestling, absolutely destroy you in grappling, Made you grab air with your hands, and at the end you gave up. last one, don't forget your words … [+68 chars]
